src:
Stok Cukup Meski 88 Kabupaten Rentan Rawan Pangan
02 Nov 2019, 04:28 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Stok Cukup Meski 88 Kabupaten Rentan Rawan Pangan

KBRN, Jakarta : Ketua Umum Kelompok Kontak Tani Nelayan Andalan (KTNA), Winarno Tohir menegaskan stok pangan yang ada di negeri ini masih mencukupi untuk seluruh wilayah Indonesia, sekalipun terdapat 88 kabupaten/ kota yang rentan dengan rawan pangan.Bahkan menurut dia, stok pangan yang ada di gudang-gudang milik Perusahaan Umum Badan Urusan Logistik (Perum Bulog) masih minim penyerapan."Cukup yang ada di Bulog. Yang saat sekarang serapannya malah kurang, sehingga banyak menumpuk di Gudang Bulog. Itu dari sisi kesiapan stok (pangan)," katanya saat berbincang dengan Radio Republik Indonesia, Jumat (1/11/2019).Hal itu ditegaskannya menanggapi catatan atas pemetaan Kementerian Pertanian yang menyatakan ada 88 kabupaten/kota di tanah air yang masuk ke dalam daerah rentan rawan pangan.Â Lebih lanjut Winarno menduga puluhan daerah rentan rawan pangan itu berasal dari luar Pulau Jawa. Sebab di luar Pulau Jawa petaninya lebih banyak menanam tanaman sawit, karet, kopi, dan kakao, bukan tanaman pangan sebagaimana di Pulau Jawa.Namun demikian, lanjutnya, beberapa provinsi di Pulau Jawa malah terjadi surplus bahan pangan. Sebut saja Provinsi Jawa Barat, Jawa Timur, Jawa Tengah, serta satu provinsi di luar Jawa, Sulawesi Selatan. Kaca mata dia, stok yang ada di daerah lumbung pangan itu sangatlah cukup untuk menutupi defisit pangan yang terjadi di 88 kabupaten/ kota."Secara umum cukup. Jadi empat provinsi seperti Jawa Timur, Jawa Tengah, Jawa Barat, dan Sulawesi Selatan itu sebagai lumbung pangan wilayah timur, itu bisa mencukupi untuk daerah-daerah yang minus tadi," pungkasnya. (Foto : Antara/ Suwandy)
text:
Enough Stock Although 88 Regencies are Vulnerable to Food Insecurity
02 Nov 2019, 04:28 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Enough Stock Although 88 Regencies are Vulnerable to Food Insecurity

KBRN, Jakarta: General Chairperson of the Andalan Fishermen Farmers Contact Group (KTNA), Winarno Tohir asserted that the existing food supply in this country is still sufficient for all parts of Indonesia, even though there are 88 districts / cities that are vulnerable to food insecurity. Even according to him, food stock existing in warehouses belonging to the Public Corporation Logistics Agency (Perum Bulog) are still lacking in absorption. "Enough is in Bulog. Which is now lacking uptake, so that many accumulate in the Bulog Warehouse. That in terms of stock readiness (food), "he said while speaking with Radio Republik Indonesia, Friday (11/01/2019). He stressed that responding to the note on the mapping of the Ministry of Agriculture which stated that there were 88 regencies / cities in the country that entered into vulnerable food insecure areas. Winarno further suspected that dozens of vulnerable areas vulnerable to food came from outside Java. Because outside of Java, farmers grow more oil palm, rubber, coffee and cocoa, not food crops as in Java. However, he continued, several provinces on Java actually have a surplus of food. Call it the Province of West Java, East Java, Central Java, and one province outside of Java, South Sulawesi. In his eyes, the existing stock in the food storage area was very sufficient to cover the food deficit that occurred in 88 regencies / cities. "In general it was enough. So the four provinces such as East Java, Central Java, West Java, and South Sulawesi are as granaries food in the eastern region, it can be sufficient for the minus regions, "he concluded. (Photo: Antara / Suwandy)
